doc.after: The historic bandy team Dinamo won the Soviet Championships in 1977[23] and 1990[24] and the European Cup in 1978. Their home ground was Medeu. Bandy was introduced for the first time at the 2011 Winter Asian Games.[25] Medeu was the main arena at the Bandy World Championship 2012.[26] The second arena built for the championships is an alternative field at Almaty Central Stadium.[27] The Federation of International Bandy has opened an office for Asia, which is located in Almaty.[28]
